name: Deichgraf
description: Deichgraf is a small and calm building game in which you slip into the role of a dike warden in East Frisia in the 16th century. Your task is to build and expand your village near the coast. But be careful! The water is omnipresent. Your challenge will be to defend your village and citizens against the threatening masses of water: Lay dry wet marshland, cultivate the soil and build dikes and ditches to stop the floods and heavy rain! For this task you have different buildings and landscaping tools available. Long live the dike warden!
